column2: I feel my power slowly coming back. I have regenerated parts of my magicka.
Magicka is raw magical energy, which can be accessed by many scholars on Mundus.\nA character can store up to 2 points of magicka per point of personal (not state) Learning.

Magicka is raw magical energy, which can be accessed by many scholars on Mundus.  A character can store up to 2 points of magicka per point of personal (not state) Learning, with a maximum of 60 at Learning 30.  Expended magicka regenerates at 1 point per year, which increases by one for every 5 points of Learning, to a maximum of 10 Magicka a year at Learning 45.

Attempt to make yourself immortal through ancient magick.

The ritual stands ready and many months of preparation and preservation of magicka have almost come to fruition.  All that remains is the final incantation, as eternity beckons to you, one of Tamriel's greatest wizards.
I shall take the ultimate gamble and laugh in the face of death itself!
On second thoughts, I do not wish to risk my very existence.

As the magicka you have hoarded for so long is released to power the ritual, there is a bright flash of light and the ritual components are utterly consumed.  For a moment, nothing seems to happen and then you feel a surge of power within you as you become instinctively aware that your ageing has stopped, now and forever.

As the magicka you have hoarded for so long is released to power the ritual, there is a bright flash of light and the ritual components are utterly consumed.  For a moment, nothing seems to happen and then all your strength drains rapidly from your body.  Everything goes dark as you slump to the floor...

The ritual stands ready and many months of preparation and preservation of magicka have almost come to fruition.  All that remains is the final incantation, as eternity beckons to you, one of Tamriel's greatest wizards.
I shall take the ultimate gamble and laugh in the face of death itself!
On second thoughts, I do not wish to risk my very existence.

As the magicka you have hoarded for so long is released to power the ritual, there is a bright flash of light and the ritual components are utterly consumed.  For a moment, nothing seems to happen and then you feel a surge of necromantic power within you as your organs shut down and you transform into one of the living dead.

As the magicka you have hoarded for so long is released to power the ritual, there is a bright flash of light and the ritual components are utterly consumed.  For a moment, nothing seems to happen and then all your strength drains rapidly from your body.  Everything goes dark as you slump to the floor...

As the magical energy permanently change your body, any physical advantage or disadvantage you once had will be removed. However, using such magic is not without drawback, and your body might suffer in the process...

Misdirection is the key to survival.  Never attack when your enemy defends, never behave as your enemy expects and never reveal your true strength.  If knowledge is power, then to be unknown is to be unconquerable.

Control is the only thing that matters.  Methods are not important - efficiency is what counts in the end.  Exploit what you conquer, for in the struggle for survival, every resource is critical.  History is written by the victors.
